job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgthere at wrap we are a small but quickly growing team our mission is to develop tools to allow for a safe nonpain compliant method for public safety members to deescalate situations and get people the help they need this is an amazing chance to be a part of company that is looking to positively impact the world while also gaining an incredible range of vr development related experience ltpgtltpgtampnbsp ltpgtltpgtthe software engineer will work on a crossfunctional team to design develop debug and virtual reality training software for law enforcement wrap reality the software developer will interface with other developers devops engineers ux designers artists and business support staff to build an immersive training environment in unity the wrap reality software integrates with web services on aws and will require interfacing with that team to iteratively support their needs additionally developers will be involved in writing unit and regression tests participating in code reviews and working with continuous integration continuous deployment software and methodologies ltpgtltpgtltbrgt ltpgt ltpgtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltstronggt ltpgt documentation ltligt ltligtparticipate in user research code reviews and ensure that coding is done according to the best practices ltligt ltligtassist in preparing software requirements and design specifications to develop applications ltligt ltligtconduct and implement performance unit and stress testing of applications ltligt ltligtcollaborate with other developers artists and customers to develop quality software products ltligt ltligtassist in defining a projects scope and objectives ltligt ltligtresearch and learn new technologies in their area of work ltligt ltulgt ltpgtampnbsp
